verbs.description: Property heiress Irina Chigirinskaya , 18 , married partner Moris Mirelli , 23 , in [ARG1: a lavish £ 1.2 million ceremony in front of 1,500 guests] , [V: held] [ARGM-LOC: at a golf club near Moscow owned by a friend of Donald Trump] .

Property heiress Irina Chigirinskaya , 18 , married partner Moris Mirelli , 23 , in a lavish £ 1.2 million ceremony in front of 1,500 guests , held at [ARG1: a golf club near Moscow] [V: owned] [ARG0: by a friend of Donald Trump] .
